thread.title: Spurs get first preseason win
thread.title_full: Spurs get first preseason win - San Antonio Express-News

author: Jeff McDonald
title: Spurs get first preseason win
text:
Photo: Tom Reel / San Antonio Express-News Image 1 of / 1 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 1 LaMarcus Aldridge jokes with Tim Duncan as the two stars return to the court as the Spurs host the Pistons on October 18, 2015. LaMarcus Aldridge jokes with Tim Duncan as the two stars return to the court as the Spurs host the Pistons on October 18, 2015. Photo: Tom Reel / San Antonio Express-News Spurs get first preseason win 1 / 1 Back to Gallery The clock winding down at the end of the first quarter in the remodeled AT&T Center on Sunday afternoon, the Spurs cleared out and funneled the ball to their new maximum contract player.
No, not that one.
It was Kawhi Leonard — he of the five-year, $94 million offseason payday — who carried the Spurs to the huddle with a picture-perfect pull-up jumper as the horn expired.
Could Leonard become coach Gregg Popovich ’s new end-of-quarter closer, as he was early in what became a 96-92 preseason victory over Detroit?
For more, visit ExpressNews.com
